remarks: The value of a curried operation given in maps-to notation is a function over the second argument of the original operation.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Oct-2019.)
statement:
mpt2curryd.f $e |- F = ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> C ) $.
mpt2curryd.c $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. X A. y e. Y C e. V ) $.
mpt2curryd.n $e |- ( ph -> Y =/= (/) ) $.
mpt2curryvald.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. W ) $.
mpt2curryvald.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
mpt2curryvald $p |- ( ph -> ( curry F ` A ) = ( y e. Y |-> [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ph x y $.
